body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack spec pango ^cairo+svg
(...)
RecursionError: maximum recursion depth exceeded while calling a Python object
```

Concretizing just `cairo+svg` works just fine. 

I have done some debugging myself, and looks like this is caused by dependency loop: `cairo -> librsvg -> cairo`.
